title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 650.5 - Customer service requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 650.5 - Customer service requirements

State Regulations
(a) Every
payphone service provider shall maintain adequate complaint handling
procedures, including the: (1)
acceptance and
processing of complaints in a simple manner and form; and
(2)
prompt investigation and resolution of
complaints. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
650.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
